Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted. Big Screen, Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: kiddrule "kiddrule"
Reviews.Content: Got this TV as a gift from my brother- could not be happier.  Big Screen nice picture.  Also, I thought an input wasnt working so I called Seiki.  Turned out to be something I was doing wrong, but they helped.

ProductInfo.Features:
50" LED HDTV; provides a breathtaking viewing experience in Full HD
3000:1 dynamic contrast ratio; delivers outstanding color clarity
6.5ms response time; displays smooth video output even during fast-moving scenes
3x HDMI and VGA input; offers flexible connectivity options for your external devices
ProductInfo.Name: Seiki 50" Class 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV
